description:
Ibiribwa, ibikoresho byo mu gikoni bigomba kuba bisukuye kandi ntibigomba kugira 
aho bihurira n’inyamaswa n’amatungo yo mu rugo
title: Ibiribwa, ibikoresho byo mu gikoni bigomba kuba bisukuye kandi ntibigomba kugira  aho bihurira n’inyamaswa n’amatungo yo mu rugo
content:
Ibiribwa, ibikoresho byo mu gikoni bigomba kuba bisukuye kandi ntibigomba kugira 
aho bihurira n’inyamaswa n’amatungo yo mu rugo. Ibiryo bigomba kubikwa mu bikoresho bipfundikiye.
